list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: (of a light or something that reflects light) shine in a bright but brief, sudden, or intermittent way.

list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: a look of terror flashed across Kirov's face
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Một cái nhìn khủng bố lóe lên trên khuôn mặt của Kirov

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: display (an image, words, or information) suddenly on a television or computer screen or electronic sign, typically briefly or repeatedly.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: suddenly the screen flashes a message
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Đột nhiên màn hình nhấp nháy một tin nhắn

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a sudden brief burst of bright light or a sudden glint from a reflective surface.
a sudden instance or manifestation of a quality, understanding, or humor.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: she had a flash of inspiration
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Cô ấy có một tia cảm hứng

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a camera attachment that produces a brief very bright light, used for taking photographs in poor light.
a platform for producing and displaying animation and video in web browsers.
excess plastic or metal forced between facing surfaces as two halves of a mold close up, forming a thin projection on the finished object.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: flap wheels are ideal for grinding off fiberglass flash
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Wheels Flap là lý tưởng để mài flash sợi thủy tinh

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: relating to thieves, prostitutes, or the underworld, especially their language.
